statements: UPDATE carbon_emissions SET carbon_emissions_reduction = 20.5 WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE carbon_emissions SET renewable_energy_source = 'Wind' WHERE country = 'China';
UPDATE carbon_emissions SET carbon_emissions_reduction = 0.5 WHERE country = 'United States' AND renewable_energy_source = 'Solar';
UPDATE carbon_emissions SET renewable_energy_source = 'Wind', carbon_emissions_reduction = 0.3 WHERE country = 'France';
UPDATE emissions SET emission_reduction = 0.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sources SET capacity = 100 WHERE source_name = 'Solar';
UPDATE emissions SET emission_reduction = 0.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sources SET source_type = 'Solar' WHERE capacity > 1000;
UPDATE carbon_emissions SET emission_amount = 500.00 WHERE emission_id = 1;
UPDATE renewable_energy_sources SET source_capacity = 1000.00, source_type = 'Solar' WHERE source_id = 2;
UPDATE carbon_emissions SET emission_amount = emission_amount + 100 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND emission_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE emission_reduction SET reduction_amount = reduction_amount - 50 WHERE emission_id = 1 AND source_id = 2;
UPDATE carbon_emission_tracking SET emission_reduction_percentage = 20.50 WHERE company_name = 'Tech Corp';
UPDATE renewable_energy_sources SET energy_type = 'Solar' WHERE source_name = 'Solar Farm A';
UPDATE carbon_emission_tracking SET emission_reduction_percentage = 10.50 WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
UPDATE renewable_energy_sources SET capacity_kW = 5000, source_name = 'Solar Energy' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE renewable_energy_sources SET carbon_reduction = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE companies SET company_name = 'New Company Name', country = 'New Country' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE renewable_energy_sources SET carbon_reduction = 0.75 WHERE source_name = 'Solar Panels';
UPDATE emissions SET emission_value = 100.55 WHERE id = 3;
